Articles.Content:
I know acceleration out of time warp was confirmed but I think I  recall somewhere that acceleration out of focus was as well (while the ship is not selected), is this correct?

If so, what are the implications of this other than long term out of focus acceleration for craft? Perhaps we will be able to make permanent orientations for craft (holding rotations while unfocused)? Thinking of future satellite network mods that require dish orientation to be correct, for example.

Edited October 14, 2020 by mcwaffles2003
